name: Transports
description: Transports is a transport business simulation game. Build trucks, buses, ships, aircrafts and trains to transport goods and passengers between industry buildings and cities.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 Bit or higher Processor: Dual Core CPU: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 560 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space Additional Notes: System specs can and will change!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Dual Core CPU: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 770 4GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space Additional Notes: System specs can and will change!
